scripts.build: wasm-pack build && rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/ && cp -r js/ dist/js && cp -r pkg dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && rm dist/pkg/package.json dist/pkg/.gitignore
scripts.build-dev: wasm-pack build --dev && rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/ && cp -r js/ dist/js && cp -r pkg dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && rm dist/pkg/package.json dist/pkg/.gitignore
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd dist && npm pack
